name: api-check
description: Validate the api to your functions to help people use them correctly. This is pretty much React's propTypes without React.

scripts.test:debug: echo 'WARNING: This is currently not working quite right...' && NODE_ENV=test karma start --browsers Chrome
scripts.build: npm run build:dist & npm run build:prod
scripts.ci: npm run code-checks && npm run test:single && npm run check-coverage && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run deployClean && npm run deployCopy && npm run deploySurge
scripts.deployCopy: cp index.html deploy.ignored/ && cp dist/api-check.js deploy.ignored/dist/
scripts.deployClean: rm -rf deploy.ignored/ && mkdir deploy.ignored/ && mkdir deploy.ignored/dist/
scripts.code-checks: npm run only-check && npm run console-check
scripts.release: npm run build && with-package git commit -am pkg.version && with-package git tag pkg.version && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm run release && npm run tag:beta
scripts.tag:beta: with-package npm dist-tag add pkg.name@pkg.version beta

author: Kent C. Dodds <kent@doddsfamily.us> (http://kent.doddsfamily.us)
